name: Morgan Williams
title: Full-Stack Developer specializing in rapid development

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description: Led the development of interactive web applications using Svelte and SvelteKit, enhancing user experience and engagement.

Implemented responsive designs using Tailwind CSS, improving mobile user satisfaction by 25%.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer

Integrated AWS services for scalable and secure deployments, resulting in a 99.9% uptime.
Collaborated with designers to implement UI/UX best practices, increasing user retention by 15%.
